website_summaries.verdict: This machine has a digital face and a durable body, but may not be strong enough for heavily soiled dishes.
pros: The digital screen is a nice touch, and the stainless steel interior is part of a design that's long-lasting and durable
It's a very good size, and fits nicely on most countertops
When running, the water is highly pressurized, so it cleans well
cons: Attachment parts aren't compatible with every faucet, making the machine hard to install and prone to leaks

website_summaries.verdict: Offers similar reliability and quality as others in its class, plus it's affordable.
pros: Can be installed underneath sink and out of sight

customer_reviews.title: Omg amazing
customer_reviews.text: All my life I have lived with a dishwasher. Even in my fraternity. I lived for 5 years in a Brooklyn apt with no DW. I hated my life. This thing saved my sanity. It is fine enough looking: it fits in my counter. I followed the directions. Thank goddness my attachment worked with out an adapter, and now my kitchen is awesome. Had for two days. Ran it six times. Heavy loads and smalll loads it freaking awesome. The pics I am postin are when my sink was full and I was awaiting this Godsend. Highly recommend for now. I hope it has the gusto to last. Will update when and if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Christian D.

customer_reviews.title: Hose leaks
customer_reviews.text: Hose attachment leaks and caused water to flood our entire kitchen counter. Otherwise seems like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Never worked right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this due to the great reviews, hooked it up and immediately got the "E4" error. Despite checking, rechecking connections, drainage, and reading the manual it still keeps giving me an E4 error message. This is being returned because it's a complete failure.
customer_reviews.author: Medic

customer_reviews.title: Best gift to myself 😊
customer_reviews.text: I live alone in a tiny house, no built in dishwasher. After a year of paper plates and washing dishes I have had enough. Lots of research led me to this machine. I did have to replace the pull-down faucet to accommodate the hose attachment, the rest was just to plug it in. I have used it for a week to form an opinion. I LOVE IT! It easily holds a day’s dishes, glasses, utensils, and silverware. I have even managed to fit in a small frying pan. It is fairly quiet, and gets the dishes spotlessly clean. Don’t hesitate, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: JudyWren

customer_reviews.title: Great, fast dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great counter top dishwasher. We use it for bottles and pump parts and it has been a lifesaver since my son came home from the hospital. Saves us a ton of time and the bottles come out clean. The cycle runs much faster than a normal dishwasher. Only downside is there isn’t much of a heat dry so you may have to dry some of the items yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L

customer_reviews.title: does not clean
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every setting. I have cycled through twice. I got a premium dishwash soap. It just does not clean. It turns, it sounds good. Even with just a little soap, it has white powdery stuff on dishes when done. Cycling again with no soap gets rid of most of that. Some of the dishes I have to hand wash with a sponge after washing. Nothing stuck on, it comes off easy. But the dishwasher did not wash it even with the dirty side facing down which has to be done. Do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne R. Crauder

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans dishes well. Very quiet. I built a shelf in my old dishwasher space and installed it below the counter. I cut the tubing near the sink attachment and connected the drain tube to the old dishwasher drain port under the sink, then I connected the old dishwasher supply tube to the new washer water supply tube. The program run times are 50 to 75% longer than in the manual, but I just select a shorter program.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher is possibly my favorite purchase I have ever made. YEARS of living in a little apartment full to the brim with the fruits and veggies of my laziness. Mountains of plates, just longing for a home. Now they have it! It was easy to install (except if you over-tighten one hose it leaks a bit) and super simple to use. It holds way more than I was expecting, including my big family pots and pans. I’ve run it far too many times now and the only issue I had was the handle on the silverware section breaking, which is really a nonissue. Highly highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Please please read !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the new townhouse I moved into doesn’t have a dishwasher and this fit perfectly under cabinet. Upon opening the box the dishwasher has huge dents in them and has water in the inside because it’s USED. I called amazon they say it’s third party so they can’t do anything to replace it. I called them and they say they never send back opened units this is a boldface lie. Look at all 1 one star comments you can see others are also reviewing that these are used products. DO NOT BUY!!! Please!! I wish someone would of told me this.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall A.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in two months
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job while it worked. Error message came on one day that water pressure wasn't good. I checked every aspect concerning this issue and it couldn't be resolved. I called EdgeStar and they proceeded immediately to send a replacement since I was under 90 days of the warranty. Lets see how the new one goes.
customer_reviews.author: PervasivePics

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet effective
customer_reviews.text: I have a genetic inability to effectively hand wash dishes no matter how hard i scrub what soap I use or the sponge I used, so got this mini dishwasher for my small kitchen. Its great for a bachelor. I use it almost daily and went from being the guy with a sink full of dirty dishes to the the man with a cabinet full of clean dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph

customer_reviews.title: Literally the best purchase I’ve ever made
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this dishwasher! I was shopping for a drying rack when I found this countertop dishwasher. I’d MUCH rather use a dishwasher than hand wash, and the dishwasher only takes up a little more space than the drying rack would. It’s even nice not having to bend over like you would with a conventional dishwasher. It fits perfectly under my counter and connects so easily to the faucet. The standard cycle seems long at 2 hours, but my dishes always come out clean. I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Van Meter

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a dented corner but an amazing dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful dishwasher. We were looking at over 10k dollars in cabinets and remodelling to be able to install a normal dishwasher and we didnt have the room to add a standard sized portable. It cleans extremely well and can hold almost all of our dishes; it just requires running multiple loads. The downside is that ours arrived with a large dent on the corner. We didnt want to have to send it back so we just dealt with it. The damage had to have happened before boxing as the unit was packed VERY well and showed no damage on the outside
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes great things do come in small packages
customer_reviews.text: Pros: works better than most normal sized dishwashers Cons: needs more room for cups. Tiny cups only fit on the top cup rack. Really wish it had a top sprayer as well. This is a very compact washer. If you know how to load dishwashers then u r good to go but if u have never loaded a dishwasher rack before I will forewarn you how much can load into it is based off how you load it. However the washer came in perfect condition and so far 😊 very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Super happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher was super simple to hook up. Took off all the packing materials, hooked up the hoses, attached it to the faucet, plugged it in and it was ready to go! It came double boxed to protect the contents and had basic instructions with bright colors and big pictures that my 80+ yr old mother instantly understood. Very quiet and cleaned the dishes perfectly. My mother was absolutely GIDDY and she's a tough sell sometimes. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: A faithful customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my mother who is disabled. Fit on her counter just like its suppose to. Runs very quietly and drains into the sink on it's own. Showed up a day early. It has all the connections and even comes with the adapter for your sink. It has a quick release connection so the hoses snap on and off quickly and easily. This has helped my mother a lot since there is very little room in her kitchen and she cannot have a normal dishwasher. Would recommend this one to anyone that can't have a standard dishwasher. Keep in mind it's not going to keep up with a large family but for 1 or 2 people perfect.
customer_reviews.author: God

customer_reviews.title: Drainage will scare your cats
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy set up. Running the first load to see how it cleans. I've attached a video regarding the drainage, as I was concerned that maybe I did it wrong at first. Some drain spurts are longer than others, and if you have cats, it will scare your cats. I don't think I've ever seen them jump so high. Mine does have a slight drip from the faucet that I am going to attempt to repair but it doesn't seem detrimental at the moment. Otherwise, it's a quiet running machine. I'll update my review after running it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Snugglebunny

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this little dishwasher! A friend of mine has the older model and recommended it to me. As a single person with about enough dishes to fill half a sink, using a full-sized dishwasher was always cumbersome. But this one is perfect! It has just the right amount of space to fit my dishes in one load. I use this thing constantly! I run it once or twice a day, depending on how much I cook. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Perez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing appliance for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher is phenomenal! It has cleaned dishes beautifully - and I haven't used rinse aid yet. It is efficient and quiet - except during the drain cycle. Be careful with stemware, and the cup rack is much too small for anything larger than a teacup. It has great capacity, but is stretched if it's for more than two people's meal mess. The washer is well made, great materials, and all around the perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy silverware basket
customer_reviews.text: The few lines you had to install are easy. The only problem I found with this product is the silverware basket it is flimsy and the handle was already broken when I received the dishwasher. Along as you don't plan on taking it out though it really isn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Hale

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It's big, but it cleans dishes for you. I load up the dish washer, and only run it when it's full, maybe every 2 days or so. The loudest thing is when it excretes the water back into the sink. It takes more than 2 hours for a normal cycle, but it only takes a couple of minutes to load. I scrape sticky food off with my fingers, else I would be cleaning the dishes. We have a spray nozzle, and adapter did not fit. I went to Lowes and bought an extender. Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Corroder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: We bought this dishwasher at the end of October and I purposely waited until December to add a review. I simply love this dishwasher! It's super easy to install and it holds a pretty decent amount of dishes, pots and pans. A normal cycle takes about 1 hour and 50 minutes to complete. It does have some noise but if you're in another room you won't hear it. It's a perfect dishwasher for a couple or a small family. It doesn't take up much counter space and it's easy to clean and maintain. If you're on the fence about buying this one, don't hesitate! Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeee!
customer_reviews.text: Great dishwasher. It has the same power and capabilities as a standard dishwasher just half the size. Fits perfectly between my countertop and upper cabinets. You can use pods, liquid detergent, and bleach. I would use cycle P1 which is for pots and pans vs P2 which is more gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Jas Mine

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked great in our office, we needed a small washer to do happy hour glasses and morning coffee mugs. We use it almost every day, no issues at all and it works well. Very quiet, plenty of room inside ( we fit a crock pot insert and pizza pans). It won't get tough baked on food off, but does a superb on everything else. Controls are nice and intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not powerful. Figured it's small, and figured the less dishes the easier they'd wash. Wrong! Weather you soak your dishes or not, same outcome. Also, constantly getting an error code. I ran this dishwasher approximately 5-6 times before fully giving up on it. Not worth the price tag. Rather buy an IKEA or something else. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much from this product, but I have to say my expectations are blown. It holds more dishes then I ever thought and they get really clean no matter how dirty they are. Now you can't put two sink fulls of dishes in it, but it does help with the chore. If you have small kitchen and need some help with dishes then this product is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Emily I

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe it took this long to buy. Hookup is extremely easy... it holds a decent amount for the size. Ran it multiple times back to back and haven’t had any issues at all yet. If anything changes will update review.
customer_reviews.author: te

customer_reviews.title: Mighty little thing.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let he size fool you, this one is just AMAZING. We keep asking ourselves, why we didn’t buy one before... Great value, super clean dishes, perfect size for daily use (family of 5).
customer_reviews.author: @RODr

customer_reviews.title: Man... What a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have so much time back now.... No more standing around handwashing. I just hook it up after dinner and let it run. I had to get a brita pitcher in case I got thirsty while it was running (you really can't use the sink for a couple hours), but I think I'm gonna attempt to permanently plumb it.. What a great dishwasher. It really does a great job cleaning- no issues here.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Lairson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Measured my countertop space before making this purchase, and this fit perfectly for me. This little dishwasher does some serious cleaning and saves my back. I'm 6'4" and my sink is too low so it always puts a strain on my back to wash dishes by hand. While I still have to clean pans by hand, it's better to do a few pans and let this dishwasher do the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome space saver for a small home, little workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Gets the dishes clean. Shockingly spacious and love the low water use. I installed it below the counter like a normal dishwasher using a universal install kit and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Solid Washer
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this washer. I have connected this directly to my water and plumbing system, and I have run a couple loads now and the dishes come out nice and clean. It’s not the fastest machine in the world, but I don’t expect it to be at this price point. Overall a good small countertop dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Makes sure your sink faucet has a female or male parts, had to change mine out.
customer_reviews.text: Game changer. Life saver. Sanity maker. Time gifter. Only regret not buying this sooner. I have been hand washing dishes in a sink too low for me for 18 years in a small cabin kitchen. Eventually I will remodel but the dishes for my daughter and myself were beginning to feel never ending and oppressive. Since getting this I have had a clean and clear sink, saves water, it’s my favorite thing ever. The quick release bivalve is very easy to use. Multiple programs to run shorter. Holds a ton of dishes if loaded right. I’m in love.
customer_reviews.author: L. LaDue

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.text: We got this because our current rental doesn't have a dishwasher. It's not a perfect replacement for a full-size dishwasher; we have to do large dishes and pots and pans by hand. Still, this saves us so much time manually washing plates, cups, bowls, silverware, etc. It has more than paid for itself. Just be aware that if you have an odd (or old) faucet, you're probably going to need an adapter, but they only cost a few bucks (get metal, not plastic).
customer_reviews.author: A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Dont put anything in front of the soap realise door as it will stop the soap from realising correctly and you will have to run twice. Other then that it washes dishes but there is no magic monkey that scruba them so you havr to prewash... More of a dish sterilizer really but thats any dishwasher under 1000$
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect on my counter!
customer_reviews.text: Came with a broken hose. I emailed the company, and they were PHENOMENAL! They responded right away and went above and beyond to make sure I got a new hose literally the next day! Extremely happy with their customer service and the dishwasher works better than I expected! It’s larger than I expected but it fits a lot of stuff in it. Totally worth the $$!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Regular-size plates do not fit in this machine.
customer_reviews.text: It cleans very well. Easy to install. Not always easy to load. Remove the cutlery basket when loading, and then put the basket back. It makes loading easier. Regular size plates do not fit in this machine. I wish that had been made explicit in the description. Still, I am happy with it. It is a great addition while I decide on when to renovate my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kajal

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction guaranteed.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment I've made since adjusting to apartment living. The item arrived well ahead of schedule. I'm more than satisfied. Easy to install and operate. Runs quietly and efficiently. I highly recommend this product from this company for complete satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: T-Bone

customer_reviews.title: Top half of a dishwasher. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Saved $20 on water bill the month used daily, doing a quick sink rinse instead of hand washing for 2-3 people. Hand washing pans, wood handled knives and utensils and hanging to dry. Sterilizes and degreases plastics and rinses crystal clear glassware.
customer_reviews.author: Sprite

customer_reviews.title: Unit no longer functions 2 months later.
customer_reviews.text: Unit showed up damaged from shipping & I received a partial refund. Unit then broke two months later and I was not able to secure a replacement. Currently stuck with a non-functional dishwasher that I have to pay to dispose of.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I had difficulties with installing it and it was hard ...
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulties with installing it and it was hard to find help! Also the quality of washing leaves a lot to be desired
customer_reviews.author: Oxana

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and they love it. However after the first few washes the dishes came out with a lot of white spots all over them. After that they wash great. It’s a bit on the noisy side but it holds a good amount of dishes and cleans them well.
customer_reviews.author: DLane

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice fits in my small kitchen on counter and it fits about a meals worth or two of stuff depending if you cooked or just eat something that did not require pots and pans. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: My Frist one ever
customer_reviews.text: Got today use it now it very. Quiet. Kindle of heavy At Frist I thought it willnt fix on my. Count but it did I love my frist portable dishwasher I love it hope it last a long time it clean the dishwasher good
customer_reviews.author: antoine grisson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this product 5 stars even though the line that connects to the sink leaks. Other than that. The dishwasher is amazing. My dishes come out super clean. Shiny. Saves me a lot of time and energy. The dishwasher is also very very quiet. The only time it “gets loud” is when it’s draining and the water is hitting the sink. But that has nothing to do with the unit itself. I was extremely skeptical before buying the unit. But extremely happy I did. Like I said, if the line didn’t leak I’d be even more ecstatic about this dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Unfriendly Rack
customer_reviews.text: Rack spacing is too open. Silverware doesn't sit in basket as it is too short. Doesn't clean very well and has only dried dishes once out of ten runs so far.
customer_reviews.author: The Real Deal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine but rack is already rusting after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans easily and well. Isn't too loud operating but it is loud discharging the water. My only and biggest complaint is that the rack is already rusting after 6 months of use. I would have given it 5 stars if it wasn't rusting. I am super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: It has a very sizable single-level rack and has quiet running. It takes 55 minutes to do the dishes but they come out as good as new and hot from the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Ross

customer_reviews.title: Owned Previous Model
customer_reviews.text: I had basically the same unit for 13 years. Of course, it had a manual timer. I have to say this unit is really an improvement. Complex wash cycles and so much quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Rattlebone

customer_reviews.title: Unit leaks
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to set up, but after making a few trips to my local hardware store I finally figure it out. After about 4 uses the dishwasher started leaking from the bottom. It is coming from inside the unit and not an external hose or anything I can fix. I can't replace or return this through Amazon. I am very disappointed with this purchase and wish I went with another option.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this dishwasher of over a year now and it’s still going strong! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: We have a small home, and this was a great purchase. It doesn't work too well for large Skillet or plates, but it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Solves my problem for now
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for about a month now I like it so far the only small thing is sometimes it doesn’t get all of the soap dissolved so I only put half as much as I should and it works i try not to over load it so it doesn’t wash too much at once but as of right now I’ll say I love it because I’ve been without a dishwasher for the last 2 years! Although for the price of this one you could find a full dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: taylor denney

customer_reviews.title: works for us
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dishwasher, for the most part it is really quite. Gets the job done and I could not be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: GarnetRose

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our dishwasher. We have used it for a few months now and I’m continually impressed at how many dishes it holds and how clean it gets them!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great preformance and price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially considering the price. I only have two issues, both aren't deal breakers but both are easly addressed by the manufacturer. First off it says 10.5" plates fit, while this is technically true they are an extremely tight fit and not easy to load or un load. I'm guessing this was a math issue converting cm to inches. Also my unit was shipped using FedEx. They are a terrible company, with worse customer service. USPS or UPS would be much better carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Andersen

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated. But don't want. It's worth every penny spent. I've gotten hours of my life back from the kitchen sink and it works as well if not better than any built in model I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Concerned the product is damaged
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived and the unit is wet. The boxes are dry, but the actual unit is wet. Did anyone else experience this? Also, the product is dented.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: You’re gonna like the way it cleans
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this machine, so far. High quality machinery. Quiet. Easy to use, and gets the job done. The best packaging I’ve ever seen. I was laughing at each layer of cardboard, styrofoam, etc that I pealed away. Good job sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. However, it arrived with a dent in the top. It had to have been shipped like that since there was no damage to the box. The seller made it right by offering a discount.
customer_reviews.author: malinda gore

customer_reviews.title: Makes kitchen clean a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Easy took hook up, though we had to remove both washers as even on was just too thick to allow connection. Manual says not to use the pods, I do with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and functionality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a godsend in our small office kitchen. Works great, it is small so you’re not going to fit a ton in it, but is perfect for the daily needs of 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skeechy
customer_reviews.text: It didnt do a very good job and dishes were soaking wet no matter what setting i put it on... It was bad enough that i hate washing dishes but do it anyway now...
customer_reviews.author: Jasonedwards902

customer_reviews.title: Very appealing, well made... Solid, large inside, does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. We bought it do handle baby bottles...and it works like a charm. Also works well on stuck on food on pots and pans too!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!! Yes, it’s easy to install and thought it would be perfect for my apartment. Every time I use it, it looks like my dishes haven’t even been washed. The powder clumps up and I end up having to hand wash half the dishes I put in it. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie Nicole

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dishwasher ever! Went for years without one regrettably- now I will always have one! Perfect size although it wouldn’t fit in my countertop I installed in a small closet in kitchen where we already had an old laundry hookup perfect! Washes great, very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia D.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our camper
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made and works great!!! We bought this for our camper and it look so nice, it looks like it was built in with our camper, like it was always there.
customer_reviews.author: cado406

customer_reviews.title: Fixed our stress
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! LOVE IT. Great quality, easy to use, life saver!
customer_reviews.author: m. fish.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about a month ago for my small house where i have no space for a full size dishwasher. The adapter for the faucet is not the greatest for when not using the dishwasher but other than that, it cleans well and has no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works fine didn’t have any issues setting up or using. Shipping on the other hand was probably the worst. FedEx took over the time expected and the box was wet and beat up but inside was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Belac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to have if you live in a small apartment
customer_reviews.text: Great to have and it's awesome to have, I no longer have to wash my dishes by hand.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it! You wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is a very good product. You just got to make sure that the dimensions fit in your kitchen and you’re all set. No more washing dishes and wasting your time. Also additionally the delivery is probably going to be UPS and sometimes that is a problem as it requires a signature
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher is awesome. For the two of us it does a great job. It's a well made product and quieter than we expected. I would highly recommend this for any RVers!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher!!
customer_reviews.text: After a bump in the road with the faucet adapter, it has been great. Customer service was wonderful and sent me a new one. There is a rubber washer inside the adapter that came out started to spray water everywhere. Once I put it back in, which took a little patience, it has been working wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I've bought on here. I've tried multiple faucets none of them fit. I reach out to edgestar told them I tried multiple faucets and still doesnt work and they told me they send a standard adapter, nothing standard when you try 6 faucets and it fits on none of them. Wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Cody Pepple

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need. But bulky, heavy, no way to hide drainage tubes from view, and must have a lot of counter space! Cleans dishes exceptionally though!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: Very small, but if you're in an apartment or tiny home, it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Nice!  Gets the dishes clean.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is good looking and easy to set up. It gets dishes clean and runs quietly. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beeksma

customer_reviews.title: Such a relief for a tiny kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about three months now with weekly use- I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Someplaces I read you can’t use pods. I do and they work great. Very easy to install with a decent size hose. It’s very quiet. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Renee Gamerdinger

customer_reviews.title: Office item
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Good buy. Connecting to sink needed professional help.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My little dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small trailer was a great size for me. Rey easy to install and worked well
customer_reviews.author: LINDA DRYE

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice in appearance and very quiet. Fits right in the counter perfectly and it is very light and easy to move. Arrived a day earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: william j deep

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Started leaking after 9 months. Company won’t replace or repair. Beware
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wyndham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small homes
customer_reviews.text: And the mountains and the small home this little Dishwasher is perfect for just two people highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Keri Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Life and Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: I was leery at first. Let me tell you this is probably the best decision I ever made. This is a life/Time saver. 10/10 would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Mistrot

customer_reviews.title: Is the dishwasher on?
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small washer for my apt. This works great and is not as loud as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Marg S

customer_reviews.title: 100% awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders. Easy to use. 7 settings and easy hook up. No leaks perfect
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for apartments. It does take up a lot of counter space but I was very surprised at how good it works
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Chase

customer_reviews.title: installation time is 3min.
customer_reviews.text: no need to buy any extra to run it! as you see in the picture it comes complete and ready to run, just buy your soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Broke after just 3 months. Getting Error code E4 and no longer works. any fixes or refunds?
customer_reviews.author: AnimalsRule

customer_reviews.title: It works amazingly!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!! First of all, it was delivered two days early. Yea me! Second, it works amazingly. I put my dirty dishes in, and get CLEAN dishes out. I am so glad that I ordered this machine!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: E4 mode, it’s broken
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the few months, now it’s stuck in E4. Had it for less than a year. Wasn’t expecting this product to suddenly stop working like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ck

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: It was doing a good job of cleaning my dishes (for what I could fit in it). Plastic that connects hose to sink broke in 1 month. Seeing if they are willing to send a replacement hose.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Neely

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kitchens without room for full size
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher works very well, it is good for anybody who doesn't have the space to put a full size dishwasher. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the silverware holders slots are too small for most silverware.
customer_reviews.author: michele hocking

customer_reviews.title: TO THE RESCUE
customer_reviews.text: What a great machine! We are a family of 4 and tired of doing dishes every night especially because we are creating so many being home due to the pandemic! Do yourself a favor and buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Scott forrest

customer_reviews.title: New Edge star Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Even with a bad back this dishwasher was easy to install by my self. Being on top of the counter loading and unloading is easy(no bending).Perfect for 1 or two people.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Devine

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect. Quiet, cleans and drys better than any home unit.
customer_reviews.text: Use in my 41' 5th wheel I live in full time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just two of us and this is just what we needed
customer_reviews.author: blhelle

customer_reviews.title: Very clean
customer_reviews.text: Compared a few models, ultimately went with this and do not regret it. Dishes come out very clean and it's easy to operate. It's also more sleek than all of the other models I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: fatima teke

product_meta.title: EdgeStar DWP62SV 6 Place Setting Energy Star Rated Portable Countertop Dishwasher - Silver
feature_bullets: Six (6) standard place setting capacity / Includes dish rack, cup shelf, and cutlery basket
Holds plates up to 10.5" in diameter / Seven (7) wash cycles / Quick connect adapter fits standard sized kitchen faucets / Beautiful digital display
Stainless steel interior / Fits under most cabinetry / Water consumption (normal wash): 2.85 gallons
Power: 1160 W/5.7 A / Input voltage: 120 V/60 Hz / Noise level: 52.3dB; Warranty: 1 year parts; 90 days labor / Dimensions: WxDxH 21 5/8" (550mm) x 19 5/8" (498mm) x 17 5/16" (440mm)
PLEASE NOTE: Do not use hand dish detergent, detergent pods, or tabs. This will cause the dishwasher to overflow

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars281 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
